reference.title: euscale-describe-scaling-activities
reference.shortdesc: Describes scaling activities for an auto scaling group.

row.entry: A list of one or more activity IDs to use as a filter. If this parameter is not specified, all activity is returned.
Filter by the specified auto scaling group.

section.title: Output
section.p: This command returns a table that contains the following:

section.title: Examples
section.p: The follow example will do something interesting.
The following shows sample output for this command.
section.codeblock: ACTIVITY cc9f60de-64cf-4055-805c-54cf9305d91d 2013-05-03T07:59:03.257 MyScalingGroup Successful ACTIVITY 194ea242-f7ea-4629-9f1e-a7ba46d435f3 2013-05-03T07:58:59.831 MyScalingGroup Successful ACTIVITY 8ff9f6b7-1ce5-416a-aeeb-5ecaccb249c6 2013-05-02T06:33:33.181 MyScalingGroup Successful ACTIVITY 459d2f55-f7d6-4062-9956-ad14ea6e7e7b 2013-05-02T06:33:23.452 MyScalingGroup Failed Failed to send message RunInstancesType to service EucalyptusRequestQueue because: Batch entry 0 insert into metadata_network_indices (creation_timestamp, last_update_timestamp, metadata_perm_uuid, version, metadata_display_name, metadata_last_state, meta ACTIVITY 02954224-6cfb-48b1-90d6-7ba3a63dd221 2013-05-02T06:33:23.381 MyScalingGroup Successful
